message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CE, cs.CY, cs.DS 

The paper proposes a novel method for addressing selection bias in counterfactual reasoning, which is a common problem in machine learning and statistics. The method involves learning two groups of latent random variables and using a regularized loss based on Pearson Correlation Coefficient to encourage de-correlation between them. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computational engineering, finance, and science (cs.CE), cybernetics (cs.CY), and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
